      • setReserveApiUrl

        public void setReserveApiUrl(String reserveApiUrl)
        Set the API URL template for Reservation.

        Format: http://{hostname}:[port]/[some/reservation/url]
        Example: http://{host}:8989/l/reserve

        Parameters:
        reserveApiUrl - the URL template for making reservation

        Format: http://{hostname}:[port]/[some/submit/url]
        Example: http://{host}:8989/l/submit

        Parameters:
        submitApiUrl - the URL template for submitting tasks

        Returns:
        the list of seeds

      • setSeeds

        public void setSeeds(List<String> seeds)
        Set the list of stand alone lightning core instances aka seeds. The seeds are considered only when embeddedMode is set to false.
        Parameters:
        seeds - the list of host names running lightning core

        Set the API URL template for audit data in JSON format.

        Example: http://{host}:8989/l/audit/json

        Parameters:

      • isEmbeddedMode

        public boolean isEmbeddedMode()
        Check if lightning core runs in embedded mode.
        Returns:
        true if the core runs in embedded mode

      • setEmbeddedMode

        public void setEmbeddedMode(boolean embeddedMode)
        Set the lightning core to run in embedded mode. If set to true, the lightning core will run in embedded mode. If set to false, lightning core will run in standalone mode and has to be registered with client by calling setSeeds(List) method.
        Parameters:
        embeddedMode - to run lightning core in embedded mode or standalone mode

      • isAllowCrossRegionInteraction

        public boolean isAllowCrossRegionInteraction()
        Check if cross region interaction is enabled.\
        Returns:
        true if cross region interaction is enabled

      • setAllowCrossRegionInteraction

        public void setAllowCrossRegionInteraction(boolean allowCrossRegionInteraction)
        Enable cross region interaction. If set to false, tasks will only be submitted to lightning core running on the same colocation. If set to true, tasks will be submitted to lightning core running on different colocation, if all the lightning core instances running in the local colocations are busy.
        Parameters:
        allowCrossRegionInteraction - to allow submitting task to lightning core running on different colocation

      • getCrossRegionSeeds

        public List<String> getCrossRegionSeeds()
        Get the list of stand alone lightning core instances from different colocations.
        Returns:
        the cross region seeds

      • setCrossRegionSeeds

        public void setCrossRegionSeeds(List<String> crossRegionSeeds)
        Set the list of stand alone lightning core instances from different colocations. The cross region seeds are considered only when allowCrossRegionInteraction is set to true
        Parameters:
        crossRegionSeeds - the list of host names on different colocations running lightning core.
